name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t MarabouQueries -o Marabou.queries/ --network f:fake.onnx

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t Agda -o Agda.agda -c proofcache.vcl-cache --network f:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t DL2Loss -o LossFunction.json --network f:NO_FILE
